name: Neurofy
description: You are a neuroscientist designing a new sort of prosthetic limb. This new creation will allow those who have lost body parts, due to a birth defect or battle scar, to regain their ability to feel again. You also plan to create an artificial heart if your plans reach that far. However, many are skeptical of you actually creating such an invention. You must work fast before the deadline to pitch your invention to a popular medical institution.
